attributes.review: the app can’t even function properly???!!! You’d think for such a SMART and EDUCATED man, trump could figure out how to keep an app updated. He definitely is all LOOKS!! attributes.title: THE WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED

attributes.review: If you had to look up “slow” in the dictionary, the picture would be this app. I’ve never seen any app download this slow. It glitches and turns off my phone. A very big inconvenience! 😫😤😤😤😤😤
attributes.title: Yikes 👁👄👁

attributes.review: Terrible app. Took hours to download and then it wouldn’t let me sign in. I then found out the app was useless cause, all the information that’s on this thing is equivalent to the things my dog says.
attributes.title: Can I get my megabytes back?

attributes.review: If I could give no stars I would it was a terrible app to use it deleted all my other apps. I could’ve gotten over that it hadn’t redirected me to erotica websites that gave me viruses. Honestly I thought it was gonna a trump themed flappy bird I was very disappointed
attributes.title: Genuinely a scam

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it instantly destroyed my phone. It caused my phone to start to catch fire and blow up. This is unacceptable, I’m sorting this review on my fridge because my phone is completely destroyed and in pieces. Don’t download this app.
attributes.title: App is horrible

attributes.review: This app is crazy! It says only white people can join and it sends demons to kidnap your soul if you don’t give it your email and phone number. Then it makes sure you use your password to sign for your soul to be sold.
attributes.title: Horrid

attributes.review: DO NOT GET I REPEAT DO NOT GET!!! As soon as i download and opened the app I got so frightened. When I opened it there was this huge clown... yes a HUGE CREEPY CLOWN STARING AT ME. Do not download. Also after creating an account my phone screen turned black and wouldnt turn on for an hour💀 i might’ve gotten a virus DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is horrible after I downloaded it and then my phone started glitching and over all just a bad experience I would like to talk to the manager because this is unacceptable .
attributes.title: Apple can do better

attributes.review: This app is a SCAM and needs to be REMOVED FROM THE APP STORE!! After downloading I’ve been getting nonstop Trump ads and have been admitted to a mental hospital after going manic from seeing him so frequently. PLEASE do NOT download this garbage app unless you want to also give it a 1 star rating!!
attributes.title: WORST APP!!

attributes.review: Awful app. It kept making my phone crash and caused it to explode. I had to buy a new phone. Plus the photos of the person on the app are rlly ugly, like who tf chose that Cheeto guy as a model. Thank you for reading this.
attributes.title: Pretend this is negative 5 stars
